actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to protect the second amendment rights of individuals to carry firearms in units of the National Park System.
short_title: National Park Second Amendment Restoration and Personal Protection Act of 2006
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: National Park Second Amendment Restoration and Personal Protection Act of 2006 - Permits the possession or carrying of firearms in units of the National Park System.

titles.title: National Park Second Amendment Restoration and Personal Protection Act of 2006
A bill to protect the second amendment rights of individuals to carry firearms in units of the National Park System.
